page.title: 06The Sausage Sizzle
page.content: The Sausage Sizzle was on the 31st May 1985 in the evening.It was in aid of the new children's play group in Springholm. Money was raised by selling tickets, sausages and playing games. One game was "roll the penny" where you roll money down a board and if it lands on a line then you lose the money but if it lands on a square you keep all the money. Another game for small children involved throwing discs over small prizes and you would win whatever you covered. There was a similar game for adults where you could win bottles of beer and wine. From 6.00 pm to 7.00 pm was a throw the wellie competition. At 7.00 pm the races started. The sausages were donated by shop and generous people.It was expected 15 children will attend the new playgroup in the primary twice a week.300 pounds were raised.
